K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-15: bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong du'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-16: chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do cig kyang thos par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-17: 'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-18: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i gdan khri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-19: gser gyi me tog khyad par can la bzhugs pa'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-21: khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la sangs rgyas de mthong zhing the tshom dag zhu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-22: khyed rnams kyang bsod nams thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428a-23: skye bo kun la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-0: de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba @428b phrag bcu bcu rang rang gi gnas nas langs te so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas thabs gcig tu dong ste byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rol mo rnam pa brgya stong thogs te me tog rin po che mchog tu bzang po'i char phab nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-1: de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-3: sgra gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-5: bdag cag gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis na; skye bo rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phas byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-8: the tshom yod na de kun dris shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-9: ngas khyed rnams la byed brag phyed par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-12: bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-13: theg pa gcig las mi bshad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:428b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-1: rnams sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-5: mi gcig la ming gsum yod pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-8: lo nyi shu yan chad la skyes bu zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-9: lo brgyad cu yan chad 'das pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-11: nga'i theg pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-12: sems rgya chung ngu nyan thos la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-14: sems rgya 'bring po rang sangs rgyas la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam chen po la zhugs pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-17: theg pa chen po bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-18: rigs kyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-19: mdor mtha' gnyis med pa dang phyogs gcig tu mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-20: shes pa'i sgo tha dad kyang mtha' gcig tu 'du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-23: thabs spyad pas gsum du bgos kyis kyang nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-24: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang theg pa chen po'i nang du 'du la theg pa chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-26: de bas na theg pa gsum yang theg pa gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-27: zhes chos 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-31: chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429a-32: mi las khri phrag brgya stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-0: mod la bla na med @429b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-1: de nas phyogs bcu nas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-5: byin gyi rlabs kyis khams 'dir phyin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i steng du theg pa chen po'i chos kyang thos nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis blangs te gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-20: chos ston pa'i sa mang po 'du ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-21: khyim pa'i gnas so so'i khyim khyim du rgya cher spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-22: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:429b-23: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas na ngan 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur ro; ;sngon de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-0: gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na lha rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa @430a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-1: skyes te rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid cing rang bzhin gyis dge ba spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-2: gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyal ba'i mdo 'di thos te dga' ba skyes nas dad pa dang gus pa'i sems kyis yi ger 'bri'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-8: phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig brjod na gang zag de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-10: tshe 'di nyid la bde ba thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-11: sdig pa rnams mi mthong zhing tshe zad de 'chi 'phos na'ang byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag rnams kyis sngon du lam drangs te bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par gnas gcig tu skye bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-12: de ci'i slad du zhe na; mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-17: sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-18: byang chub sems dpa' lags par mngon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-19: de bas na de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-20: bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-21: rgyu dang rkyen des na mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa rnams gcig tu skye zhing mi 'bral bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-22: de nas tshangs pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-23: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-24: 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430a-25: gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-0: gnod @430b sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-1: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-14: rlung gi lha la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rang rang gi stan las langs te; bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing gus pas phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'dri la rtag tu bsrung zhing 'dzin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-18: mdo sde 'di gang du gnas pa der bdag cag gis rtag tu mdun du bdar te yongs su dag par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-22: dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-23: gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sug pa mi gtsang bas mdo sde 'di bzung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-26: bdag cag gis gang zag de 'gro sdod 'dug nyal spyod lam rnam bzhir lus dang sems mi bde bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-27: gang du gnas pa der 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-28: glo bur du gnod la 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-29: tshe 'di la mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:430b-30: tshe 'phos na'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-1: la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la gus par bgyis te sug pa gtsang mas blangs shing 'chang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-2: khrus bgyis te bdug spos kyis bdug cing bklags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-9: sdig pa'i chos rnams ma spyad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-10: bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gang zag de'i rim gro bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-12: gang zag de nyal na'ang de'i mdun du mchis te ltas ngan pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-13: yang gcig tu na dgra ma rungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-14: gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-15: de gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-17: bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu 'brang zhing ci 'tshal ba sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-18: phyogs bzhir gang du mchi na'ang bgegs ma mchis par rgyun du dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe 'phos na'ang lhar skye bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-19: rgyu de dang rkyen des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-20: sangs rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po mi stor bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-24: lha ma yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431a-27: khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-0: mdo sde 'di thos par yang mi 'gyur @431b na; mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-1: ga la te mdo sde 'di blangs te bzung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-4: kha ton du byed par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-5: khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te khang ba dben pa gtsang ma'i nang du ba dan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-7: gdugs kyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-10: byug pas mchod cing phyag btsal nas de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu thog mar mgo btsugs nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re re zhing mdo se 'di bklags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-12: dran pa mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-13: rtog pa mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-14: bsam pa mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-15: gzungs su 'dzin pa mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-16: spyod pa mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-17: bstan cing bslab pa mi g-yeng bar nyin mtshan dus drug tu mdo sde 'di'i nang nas byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-19: mdo sde bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-20: kha ton du 'don cing mos pa dang gus par byed nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-21: mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba'i sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-22: de la the tshom mam yid gnyis su ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-24: thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-25: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:431b-30: mdo sde kun gyi rgyal po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-1: sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-2: thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-3: 'jig rten na chen po drug dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-15: bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-18: sme gtsog thams cad 'khru bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-23: ljan ljin thams cad tshig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-26: sme gtsog thams cad 'bud par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-28: nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ste; mun nag yod do cog snang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-31: bzang ngan yod do cog thams cad shong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-32: de lta bu'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-34: yar byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-36: mar 'jig tshogs kyi gzugs can no cog mi shong ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-37: de bas na khyed rnams kyis mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung ste chongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-38: kun tu spel bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432a-39: dad cing gus par byos shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-0: khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @432b rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-1: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon du mthong bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-2: khyed lha rnams kyang mdo sde 'di blangs te 'chang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-4: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-5: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-6: dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-8: de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa zhes bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-10: bdag cag rnams gsol zhing zhu ba mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-11: dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-12: bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa la bka' stsal pa; shin tu legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-15: dri ba yod na ci 'dod pa bzhin dris shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-16: ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-17: khyod kyis dris pa de'ang sems can dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:432b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-0: bdag dran pa sngon yun ring por @433a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-1: 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin chen gtsug phud ces bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan gcig thos na lhar skye ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-3: de las yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams na dgon pa'i nang zhig la rdzing chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab bskams nas de na nya chen po stong phrag bcu zhig mchis pa gdugs kyis gdungs te 'gum du nye ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-4: dra ma chu 'bebs zhes bgyi bas nya de dag mthong nas sems can la shin tu byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-5: snying rje skyes te chab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-6: kha zas stsal kyang dgung 'ga' tsam zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-8: tshe ring por mi thogs par 'tshal bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pa nya de dag gis thos ma thag tu dus las 'das te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sar skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-11: dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du sangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-12: rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan thos na tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-14: dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-15: rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433a-16: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433b-0: sdom pa'i @433b rtsa ba nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433b-1: nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433b-4: gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya cher bshad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:433b-5: bskal pa brgya stong khri'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-3: gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag thos na bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing srid pa gsum gyi khams su mi gtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-4: rtag tu rnam par grol ba'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-10: mu stegs can du mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-11: dbang po yan lag tshang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-12: dam pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-13: sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-14: theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-15: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-16: de bas gus par phyag 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos la bden par gnas shing phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-19: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-20: lha 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452a-21: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-0: dge slong sems stor ba @452b 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-1: sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-4: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-7: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshan sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba can rnams kyis lan gcig thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-9: zhes khyod nyid kyis bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-10: da yang nga la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing sems can kun sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir ngas kyang khyod dang skye bo kun la dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-11: don dam par na dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang gis gsum du bshad pa gang la la de'i mtshan thos na sems thag pa nas dran par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-12: 'chi kar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan lan gsum du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-15: na ma: sam gh'a ya zhes de skad ched du brjod du bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-16: mi 'di 'chi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du mi 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:452b-17: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-1: thams cad la mthar gyis rim gro byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-4: kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-5: thos nas kyang de ma thag tu skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-7: gang zag de'ang bskal pa grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan thos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-15: ci ste dngos po gcig na ni; skyabs gcig tu song bas dngos po gsum lags na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-16: skyabs gsum du gyur pas skyabs gsum du gyur na ni sangs rgyas dang chos kyang dbyings tha dad par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-18: gal te skyabs gsum zhig lags na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-19: skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas bskal pa gsum gyi bar chos spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi mjal bar mchi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453a-21: sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag la bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-0: bdag 'di thos nas kyang skye bo kun la bye brag phyed par bshad par @453b gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-2: mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na gang la las mtshan thos na bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-8: don chen po 'di lta bu nga la zhu bar nus pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-9: shin tu legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-11: khyod 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri ba'ang sa dang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-18: sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-19: sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-22: ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-25: thog ma med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te khams gsum gyi btson ra na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gzir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-26: lam rgyud drug tu phan tshun rnam par rgyu ba la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas med nas lha ma srin la phyogs te skyabs tshol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-27: mu stegs rnams rang gi rkang lag bcings shing srog btang ste skyabs tshol na'ang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:453b-28: me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te srog btang yang 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-0: de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin @454a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-1: gshegs pas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun du 'khrul pa rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing yang dag pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir bslab pa dang po nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-2: rang byang chub pa rnams la them skas dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang dngos po tha dad par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-3: de'i 'og tu rgyun ring du tshangs par spyad pa'i skyes bu dam pa la yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum dngos po gcig par yang bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-4: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig gi nang na chos dang dge 'dun gyi dkon mchog kyang yod par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-6: ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-8: 'jig rten gyi rin po che sna bdun po phongs pa rnams la 'tsho ba bstangs pa dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-9: ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-10: dkon mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-11: sangs rgyas rgyal po'i khab tu sku sprul cing byang chub sems dpa' yin pa skad du sems can bsgral ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dang dka' thub spyad de; byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454a-14: ma rig pa'i gnyid las sad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-2: ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-3: dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-7: yang dag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid grol ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-9: 'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i zag pa zad pa'ang 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-10: zag pa thams cad 'gags nas 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-13: don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-16: dge sdig gi chos thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-23: de'ang sems kyis dmigs so cog chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-25: dge 'dun gnyis dngos po'ang mi gcig la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-26: ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-28: dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su dbyings mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-30: ji ltar so sor dbye bar dka' zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-31: gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gnyis kyi mtshan bla dvags su btags te rnam par dpyod pa bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po lnga thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-32: dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:454b-33: zhes bya bar don de lta bu'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-0: dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod nams kyi @455a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-1: dbang gis mi lus thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-2: chos dang bral na mi med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-3: mi las gud na'ang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba ga la yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-5: mi dang chos su gcig tu mthun la tha dad pa'ang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-6: chos kyi dbang gis mir grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-7: mi'i dbang du chos 'gro bas de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-10: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-11: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-13: ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa'ang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-14: nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-15: dge 'dun dkon mchog tu bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-16: yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-17: gtan tshigs su dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-18: chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-21: don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun tha dad pa'ang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-22: de'ang chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-23: de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad nas sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-24: khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur ro; ;spyod pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal sbom po las thar gyis kyang sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455a-25: de'i phyir yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-0: @455b sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-4: sdug bsngal yin pas yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-5: deng 'dir bshad pa ni; rtag tu gnas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-6: rnal 'byor spyod pa ba rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-7: phyin ci log brgyad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-8: skye 'gag med pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-9: sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-10: rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cog dmigs pa'i mthar phyin par spyad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-11: yang dag pa'i chos dkon mchog ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-12: spyod pa pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i chos kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-14: yang phyin ci log brgyad gtan du bral bas 'phags pa dang skye bo thams cad mthun zhing nam du'ang rtsod pa med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-16: sngon dkon mchog gsum mi dang chos su tha dad par bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-17: deng 'dir sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang der byung bas don de'i phyir nas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-18: skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-21: gang la rnam par rtog ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:455b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-1: kyi bu; khams gsum mi rtag par bsam ste theg pa chen por bsgrub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-2: byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-3: ji ltar na mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-5: mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhag la byams pa dang snying rje thog mar 'gro bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-6: skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bsgral na'ang lan mi re ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-7: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-8: de la sems can yongs su mi gtong ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-11: grong khyer chen po gcig 'khor rgya dpag tshad gcig la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-12: sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gror na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-15: shin tu 'jigs pa'i sa cher yod kyis kyang grong khyer der phyin na shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas skyes bu mi gcig la bu gcig pa zhig yod pa shin tu'ang sdug mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-16: grong khyer de na bde skyid pa'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-17: zhes thos pas bu sdug pa der bor nas grong khyer der 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyi lam 'jigs sa rgal nas grong khyer de'i sgor phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-18: rkang pa ya gcig nang du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456a-19: rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa'i bar du bu de dran nas 'di ltar bsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-0: bdag la bu gcig pu yod pa bdag chas pa'i khar ci ste ma @456b khrid; da su zhig slad na gso zhig gu zhes bsam nas grong khyer de btang ste slar bu'i thad du chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang snying rje'ang de dang 'dra ste byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-3: bsgoms te zag pa zad na yang mi shes grub pa mi len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-5: sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zag pa zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-6: mngon par shes pa spong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-7: so so'i skye bo'i sar bgrod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-9: dper grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-10: rnam par thar pa chen po la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-11: dper sgo mang po zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-13: dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-14: bdud dang bgegs lta bu la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-15: dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-16: mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-17: dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste them pa'i nang du 'jug pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-19: dper rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-20: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnam par ma grol ba la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-21: dper bu gcig pu lus zhes smra ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-22: lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-23: dper bu la dran pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-24: snying rje chen po la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-25: dper bu'i thad du ldog pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-26: sems can 'dul zhing rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:456b-27: dper lan dang grub pa mi len pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-2: snying rje chen pos bsdus te mi gtong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-6: byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can la rtag tu dge ba bcu dpog par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-9: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-10: 'dod pas log par mi g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-11: brdzun du mi smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-12: phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-13: ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-14: don med pa'i gtam tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-15: brnab sems mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-16: gnod sems mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-17: log par mi lta ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-18: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-19: snying rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-21: dge ba ston cing bde ba la 'god par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-23: sdug bsngal las thar pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-24: dmyal ba las sgrol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-25: skye bo rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar sgrub 'dod pa'i sgom shes pa mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-26: byang chub sems dpa' skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-27: snying rje ba'i dbang gis sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon par ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457a-28: theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i @457b spyad pa spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-3: yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-5: mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos spyad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-18: de lta bu spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-19: 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-21: khams gsum na bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na chos rnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du bgrod par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-23: yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod par bshad mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-24: bla na med pa'i byang chub ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-25: dus gsum du mi gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-26: mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung na dus gsum dang khams gsum lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-27: chos bcu po gang zhe na; bstod pa dang smad pa la sems skye bri med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-28: snyan pa dang mi snyan par thos pa la sems rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-29: shes rab can dang gti mug can la 'dra bar snying rje bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-30: sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste snyoms par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:457b-31: mchod pa gus ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-0: gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyags mi 'dogs pa @458a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-2: theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na'ang theg pa gcig tu lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-3: ngan song gsum gyi sgra thos na'ang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa'i sems mi skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-5: bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-6: chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-7: byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-8: byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa khams gsum na bgrod pa'i tshe snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul mi gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-10: bsam gyis khyab dka' zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-11: gang zhig 'jig rten rnam dag na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-12: bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-13: tshul khrims dam du srung ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-14: skyes bu de ni skad cig tsam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-15: byams pa spyad pas dam pa mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-16: gang zhig 'jig rten sa 'di ru; ;lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-17: ngan song gsum du ltung nges dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-19: byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-20: 'jig rten ngan par skyes na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-21: 'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458a-22: ngan song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-0: nyon mongs sgrib pa spang @458b 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-2: dam chos srung bas shes rab 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-3: rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-4: tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-5: deng nas sang gi bar dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-9: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-10: shin tu rnam dag mthong ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-11: sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-12: khams der bsod nams bya ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-13: dka' ba snyam du mi mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:458b-15: rang gis mi bzod bzod bya ste //
