K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-2: sems can la phan pa dang bde bar byas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-3: de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad pa'i tshe na lha bzhi khris ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-4: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-5: mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-6: chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-7: byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-8: chos kyi khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-11: khyod mdo sde 'di legs par zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-13: ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-19: thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'joms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-20: mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas par gzhig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-21: nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-23: 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching ba 'grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463a-24: khams gsum gyi btson ra 'dral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-0: 'khor ba las thar cing @463b mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su sgrol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-1: sa bon dam pa'i rgyu bskams pa la rlan par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-2: rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char 'bebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-3: sems can theg pa gsum gyi myu gu dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-4: byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-7: bdag sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyan snga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-8: 'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-9: tshogs dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-10: don rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-11: mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-12: theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-13: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-14: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-15: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-16: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-18: deng thos pa 'di dag rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-23: khams gsum gyi sems can rang skye zhing rang 'gag par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:463b-24: chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-1: gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bsnyegs te mya ngan las 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-2: zhes bla dvags su brjod pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi sku thob par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-4: chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-8: ji ltar bshad pa bzhin bsgoms te dus gcig tu sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-12: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung zhing klog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-16: bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-19: gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464a-20: mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos pas bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-0: gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcur nor @464b bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-1: mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-2: gang la las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-3: theg pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang na yi ge 'bru gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-7: de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-8: 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams su rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas kyang sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i shloo ka gcig klog gam kha [?] don byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-9: bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-10: stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi skyabs byin pa bas kyang gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig shes te gzhan la tshig gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-11: shloo ka gcig gi don bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-12: bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-14: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-15: nyan thos kyi sbyin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-16: tshe dang longs spyod pa skyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las mi thar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-17: theg pa chen po chos kyi sbyin pa ni; sems can rnams kyi byang chub rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-18: theg pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:464b-20: mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-1: rungs pa yin na'ang da dge ba dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-2: sngon sdug bsngal can yin na'ang da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-3: sngon 'ching ba can yin na'ang da grol thar pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-4: sngon ma rgal ba yin na'ang da rgal ba can yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-5: sngon blun pa zhig yin na'ang da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-7: sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na'ang da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-9: sngon so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na'ang da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-10: 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-11: sngon chos lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na'ang da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-12: 'phags pa'i lam la chud pa'o; ;lus skye bo'i lus can yin na'ang mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-14: sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na'ang da mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-16: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-18: de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-19: sngon so so'i skye bo lags kyang da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-20: 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-21: sngon nyon mongs pa can lags na'ang da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465a-23: 'chang bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-0: @465b mtshams ma mchis par spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-1: dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa'ang ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa zhig lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-2: don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-4: bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-8: khyod kyis kyang legs par zhugs pas ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-10: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-12: dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-13: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-14: dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa yong med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-17: dra ma mi gcig la bu gcig bu zhig yod pa de shin tu'ang phang shing sdug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-18: pha yod pa'i tshe na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-19: nyin mtshan du bstan cing bslabs pas byas so cog la 'gal ba med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-20: bu'ang pha la sri zhu che ste pa'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yong ma byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-21: re zhig dus gcig na pha lam ring por mgron du song ba las ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i bar du bu de pha'i bston ngag brjed nas nyes pa'ang mang du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:465b-22: pha ring du lon te sar ma 'khor ba'i phyir ba shi ba skad du brjod de dud mo dag byed cing khad kyis 'chal du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-1: gyis non te sems stor nas pha'i bstan pa'ang brjed de chos la skur ba dang 'dra bar 'gal ba sha stag byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-2: pha de yun ring mo zhig lon nas dus gcig na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe bu'ang shin tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pha'i bstan ngag kyang dran te gzung su bzung nas nyes pa'ang ma byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-3: pha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi bar yang yid ches nas log par ltung ba can zhes kyang mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-4: pha'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal bar spyad pas skur ba can zhes kyang mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-6: dra ma zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-8: bu gcig bu zhes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-10: phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-12: lam ring por song zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-14: pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-17: mya ngan gyis non pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-21: shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-22: don 'khrul pa'i phyir skur ba btab pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-23: de bzhin gshegs pas khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te sems can gyis mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466a-24: sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-0: sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas sems kyi rang @466b bzhin slar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi nyams pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-1: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-3: bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-4: chos la mi skur ba yin no; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-5: mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-6: 'khor ba grangs med pa'i nyon mongs pa sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-7: gang mdo sde 'di thos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-9: gang mdo sde 'di mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-13: gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-14: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-15: gang mdo sde 'di bshad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-16: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-17: gang mdo sde 'di'i don shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-18: sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-19: gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-20: sangs rgyas kyi don legs par khrol ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-21: nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-23: mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-25: bskal pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu rtsi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-26: zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-27: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:466b-28: yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad pa bas kyang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-1: no; ;gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-2: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-3: de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-11: ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-12: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yong su 'byang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-13: bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-14: 'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu med pa'ang 'ju bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-16: nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-18: rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-19: so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-21: rang sangs rgyas yon mi 'ju mi srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-22: sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nus na'ang bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul cing sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pas mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467a-25: mdo sde kha cig las byung ba lta ba log pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-0: tshul khrims zhig pa rnams khams @467b gcig tu lhan cig gnas su'ang mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-1: chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal du'ang mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-3: gso sbyong gi tshe gang dag de 'phag pa'i lam stor ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-4: dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang mi chud ces 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-5: ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhes gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-6: gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na ni; de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-10: de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-11: bdag kyang de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-16: khyed la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-17: snying rje phun sum tshogs par ldan pas sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bsam ste don de zhu ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-19: ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-20: legs par soms la nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-21: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-23: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig par yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:467b-26: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-0: sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud par zad @468a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-2: ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-3: sems can bzang ngan rnam par me rtog par sbyin pa byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-4: bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-6: byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-7: bsod nams kyi yon tan brgya thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-8: log spyod la spyod pa byin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-9: bsod nams kyi yon tan lan stong thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-12: 'chi 'phos nas log spyod kyi rgyun du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-15: 'chi 'phos na byol song gi rgyud du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-16: log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang bsod nams can gyi yon 'ju na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-18: 'chang ba'i gang zag lta zhig ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-19: de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-20: byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-23: dam pa'i chos la skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-25: nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-26: mchod yon yang 'ju bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-27: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-0: thar pa chen po phyogs su @468b rgyas pa'i mthu dang phyin yang bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-2: klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-7: khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-8: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-10: dang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-11: ngas dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyad pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-12: tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-13: bskal pa de 'das nas bskal pa mthong bar mos pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:468b-14: bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-0: bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na nga @469a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-1: de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te bsnyan bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-2: bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-3: 'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-6: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-7: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-8: nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas nas gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming thos te nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs kyis kyang mdo sde 'di da dung ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-9: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsags te mchod pa phul na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-11: nga sngon bskal pa de snyed du sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-12: bsnyen bkur dang bstod pa byas nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469a-13: tshul phun sum tshogs pa tshang par spyad cing sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-3: gti mug spangs te sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-6: ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa dang; thos so cog thams cad mi brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-7: 'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-8: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-9: bsam gtan las byung ba chos nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-12: bsam pa la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-14: sdom pa mnos so cog 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-15: nyams pa mang du byung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-18: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-19: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-21: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas par bsgoms par byas na; lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:469b-22: gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na'ang rdzogs par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-0: nga bskal pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis tshogs chen po dpag tu med pa la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa der @470a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-1: mthong nas nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-3: rgyal ba de las blangs te 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-5: kha ton du bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-6: don bsam pa la sogs byas nas de ma thag tu chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-8: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-9: zhes bya bar lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-10: de bas na rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-12: klog pa la sogs pa byas na sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang myur du thob par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-13: 'jig rten na lha dang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-15: de'i phyir ngas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin po che'i snying po dang 'dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-16: dbul phongs pa rnams kyi tshul dang rin po che'i nor bu sbyin par byed pa la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-17: theg chen dpe tshad rgya mtsho bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-18: theg pa chung ngu pa rjes chu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-19: theg chen dpe tshad ri rab lhun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-20: theg pa chung ngu grog ma'i mkhar; ;theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-21: theg pa chung ngu me stag tsam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-22: theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-23: bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470a-24: dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-0: sems can thams @470b cad go 'byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-1: theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-3: theg pa chen po 'di nang nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-4: theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-5: dpag pa'i grangs shig yod na ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-6: thams cad bsgral bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-7: theg pa bla na med pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-8: sems can yongs su bsgral nus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-9: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-10: gang gis dpag med 'di spyad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-11: nam mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-12: gzugs dang dbyibs kyang yong med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-13: theg pa chen po'ang de bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-14: thogs pa med cing dpag tu med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-15: sems can thams cad de dag kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-16: theg pa chen po 'di zhon la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-17: theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-18: gtos rgya che zhing mang du shong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-19: gal te theg chen yon tan dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-20: theg pa gcig tu spyod pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-21: bskal pa dpag med rab bshad kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-22: mtha' ru rdzogs par yong mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-23: theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-24: theg pa chen po dam pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-25: sems thag theg chen 'di blangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-26: byang chub shing drung mngon par 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-27: 'ching ba med cing thogs med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-28: bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-29: theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-31: rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam rtag ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-32: sems can rnams la snying brtse phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-33: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-34: theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-35: gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:470b-37: nam mkha' bzhin du kun shong bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-0: @471a *// theg pa chen po bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-1: de phyir sems can thams cad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-2: brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-3: mngon par shes pa rnams dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-4: ye shes chen po thob par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-5: lha yi tshogs dang lha yi bdud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-6: mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-7: theg pa chen po'i skyabs song la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-8: mngon shes drug dang ldan par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-9: rig pa gsum dang rnam thar gsum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-10: des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-11: log par lta ba'ang 'jil bas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-12: theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-13: nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-14: dge rtsa phun sum tshogs 'gyur bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-15: theg chen mthu ni bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-16: de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-17: 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-19: slob dang mi slob de dag kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-20: theg pa chen por kun 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-21: sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror spyod pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-22: log par lta ba dang ni sdig grogs bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-23: gang zhig theg pa chen por ma dad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-24: des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'joms mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-25: de rnams spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-26: grol thar 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-27: skyes bu gang zhig don 'di shes 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-28: theg chen bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-29: de ni theg chen mi ni yin par mngon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-30: zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471a-31: de yang theg chen dbang gis rnam par brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-0: gang zhig @471b theg pa chen por spyod nus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-1: de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-2: gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-3: de ni bsod nams dpal med thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su phyin pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-5: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag med mchod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-6: de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-7: mchod na 'jig rten theg pas thub pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-8: dpal dang gzi brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-9: de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-10: byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-11: phun sum tshogs ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-12: gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-13: bla na med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-14: lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-15: de phyir theg pa bla med thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-16: tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-17: rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-18: de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-19: rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-20: des ni theg pa chen po thob pa'o; ;sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-21: theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-22: gang zhig theg chen chos la bde gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-23: de ni tshe dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-24: yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-25: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi stobs kyang rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-26: dam chos yang dag don la brten pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:471b-27: theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-2: mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-3: rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-4: theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so; ;rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste 'bru gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-6: tshigs bcad gcig 'chang ngam klog na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-7: bsod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-11: sdug bsngal kun dang yong bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-12: nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi ltung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-13: bde ba'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur; ;gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-14: phyi ma ma 'ongs dus ngan tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-15: mtha' ru sangs rgyas 'grub par yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-16: ngas ni lung du bstan par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-17: gang gis rgyal la rtag gzhol pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-18: rgyal ba'ang rtag tu de la gzhol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-19: gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsrungs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-20: rgyal ba'ang de la srung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-21: rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-23: 'khor ba'i rgyud las bsgral ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-24: bdud kyi dbung bcas 'jil yang nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-26: ngas ni mdo sde 'di thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-27: bzod par gnas te lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-31: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-32: ngas kyang lung du bstan par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472a-33: gang gis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-0: @472b mdo sde 'di yi don shes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-1: blun po rnams la rab bshad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-3: sangs rgyas 'jig rten mi bzhugs kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-5: gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-6: sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-8: ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa las mdo sde 'di ma nos te 'chang ba dang; bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-12: deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-13: las kyi rgyu gang dang gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-17: yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-18: gal te ngas rgya cher bshad du bskal pa'i bar du'ang bshad pas mi rdzogs pas deng mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:472b-21: sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-0: @473a *// yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-1: bla ma la bsu skyel dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-4: mchod rten sgrub pa phu dud du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-5: sems can thams cad la ma brnyas pas rting ba yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-6: dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs pas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-7: bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas sor mo bar 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-8: gos bzang po sbyin pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-9: bza' ba dang; btung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-12: nyams su bde ba byin pas bdun shin tu mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos la thos par dga' bas ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-14: gzhan gyi g-yo dang mtshang sbed cing bcabs las gsar ba'i gnas sdubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473a-15: dge ba bcu bsgoms pas sengge'i ro stong lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-0: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te sems can la rtag tu ston pas phrag so shin @473b tu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-1: 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-2: gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-3: mchod rten sgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-4: slong ba rnams la bdog pa med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por pus mo'i lha nga la slab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-5: rtag tu dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-6: srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-7: na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-9: nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas ro phro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-10: yun ring po nas tshig kyal ba spangs shing dus su smra bas sengge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-11: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-12: rtsod pa rnams sdum pa la dga' bas tshems thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-13: rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-14: lus dang ngag yid yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:473b-15: ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-1: la rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-2: byams pa'i sems bsgoms te rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-3: sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sgrub pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-4: gzhan la bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-8: slob dpon la sogs pa'i bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin du rim gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-9: btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-10: theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-14: gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-15: 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs de smra ba spangs pas ba spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474a-17: mkhan po dang; bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-0: bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par @474b 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-1: yon tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-2: sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin sgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-3: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-4: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-5: zhes de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-6: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-8: chos thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub pa ste ma mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-10: ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher grub ces gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na'ang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-26: chab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-27: rus sbal gyi spu dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:474b-28: ri bong gi rva dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-0: @475a *// nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-1: mo gsham gyi bu dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-2: gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-4: de dag mchis pa dang ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-16: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-18: spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis brtags na bdag ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-27: byed pa po la sogs pa ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-30: mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-33: rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-36: sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475a-39: lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-0: lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma @475b lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-3: yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-4: rnam par shes pa ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-6: rnam par shes pa dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-9: gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-24: rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-27: bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-28: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'ang mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-29: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-34: ji ltar byung ba'ang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-36: yongs su dag pa ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:475b-41: gang zag la sogs pa'ang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-2: yun du bzhugs pa la gang gi slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-4: zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-6: khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-8: yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par chud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-9: chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te yun du gnas par yang shes pas rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-13: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya shin tu dang ba gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-14: 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung na'ang snga mkho bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-15: khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-16: rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khyed rnams da ltar khams gsum na snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476a-18: sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam rdzab kyis ma gos pas na don 'di lta bu dag 'dri nus pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-0: chos so cog @476b thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-1: yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod pa zhes bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-2: chos kyi nang du yi ge med la yi ge'i nang du'ang chos med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-3: kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ge bstan to; ;yi ge'i nang du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-5: byang chub kyi nang du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-8: yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-9: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-15: sgom spyod rnams dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-16: yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-17: de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-18: skye ba gcig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma skyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-19: de las babs te yum gyi lhums su'ang mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-20: chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas tnga ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-21: skye rga na 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-22: phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma por /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-24: 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-25: grong khyer mchog tu na chung bzang ma dang yang ma rtse na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-26: 'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa'ang ma bslabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-27: stobs dang 'phong rtsal yang ma bsgrun /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-28: sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir gan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:476b-29: lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-0: nad pa mngon sum du bstan @477a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-1: pa ni; tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-2: shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-3: 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-4: dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-5: sems can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i chos brtson par bsgrub par bya ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-6: grong khyer mchog nas byung ste gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-7: khams gsum gyi btson ra nas thar pa dang 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-9: byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-10: de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-13: rta tsanta ka zham ring dad pa can la slar bskur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-14: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang dbral bar bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-16: chos thams cad la mi chags par bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-17: ka sha ngur smrig gyon pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-19: drang srong au ta ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-20: aa ranta la chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-21: rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-22: lo drug gi bar dka' thub spyad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-25: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-26: rtsva sva sti ka blangs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-27: cho ga shes par bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477a-28: rtsva bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-0: nyam @477b rangs dang g-yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-1: lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-2: yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-5: phyag g-yas pa sa la brten pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-6: bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-7: sa chen po kun tu g-yo ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-8: drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-9: de ltar mtshan ma med par bsgoms pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-10: 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du mkhyen nas chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-12: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thub pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-13: chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-15: dus gsum gyi bya ba dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos mngon du gsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-17: bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes bya'o; ;gang zhig de ltar bslab cing rtog pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-18: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-19: de la log par rtog pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-20: byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-24: mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skye mi 'gog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:477b-25: sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-4: bcom ldan 'das; bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-5: stong pa nyid du rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba'am nub pa mi mnga' bas rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang ma bltams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-7: byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang mya ngan las ma 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-8: mtha' las 'das te yun du gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-9: sems can yongs su bsgral bar mdzad pa'i slad du dka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang yang dag par na 'gyur ba'am spros pa mi mnga' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yun du gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-10: khams gsum na sku 'byung ba'ang chos kyi sku rnam pa lnga 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-13: sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-15: sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-17: sku nam mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-18: de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-19: yang dag pa'i 'bras bu mchog mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-20: sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478a-21: sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-0: sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge ba thams cad phun sum @478b tshogs par mdzad pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-1: sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-2: sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-3: chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-4: spyod yul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te yang dag par rdzogs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-5: sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-6: sku sprul cing 'byung pa zhes bgyi ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing skyabs su mi mdzad pa ma mchis te sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-8: sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-9: sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-10: nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na chos kyi sku yang mtha' yas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-11: nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pas na chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra bas sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du sku rnam pa lngar ston pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-14: 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:478b-15: chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing chos rnam par spel ba legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces @479a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa'am thogs pa med de; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-5: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-6: 'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-9: ngan song lta ci zhig smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-11: 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-12: 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing theg pa chen po thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-15: de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te phyag 'chal zhing mchod pa byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-16: 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-17: sems can gang la las theg pa chen po chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur; gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479a-18: sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la @479b byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-1: mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-3: sengge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-5: nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni; de bzhin gshegs pa brtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-6: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-7: yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-9: lha'i bdud mu stegs la sogs pa spa bkong ste skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-11: de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams kun khebs par g-yogs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-12: rnam pa drug tu g-yos zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-13: shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-14: nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'; lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-15: byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-17: mtha' mnon dbus dma' ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-18: sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-19: ljags kyi drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:479b-20: snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-2: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-7: lcags kyi ri khor yug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-8: dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dma' med par mnyam par gyur cing nyal nyil dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-10: kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-11: dper na; shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-13: nam mkha' nas bab pa'i me tog gi char bab pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-16: na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su gang ste nam mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-17: sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-18: rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-19: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-24: spyod la ma de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480a-25: theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-0: de'i tshe tshigs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong bas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i byin gyi @480b rlabs kyi mthu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-1: sh'akya thub pa yang byams pas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-2: gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-3: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-4: nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-5: theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-6: dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-7: dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-8: dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-9: phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-10: dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-11: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-12: dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcu zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-13: rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-14: lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-15: chos kyi mig rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-16: rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-17: de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i sgra stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-19: gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-20: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-21: chos kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-22: dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:480b-24: sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-0: @481a *// sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-1: sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-2: chos kyi mthu lags na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-4: dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-5: dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi lags na gsum char la gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-6: gong na gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-8: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can lta ci zhig smos zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-11: sems can la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-12: bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu legs par nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-13: sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-14: chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-15: dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-16: kun tshogs pa'i mthus sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-17: sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-20: sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas dran pa'i mthu mar pos khams gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481a-21: phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-0: sangs rgyas kyang @481b chos so; ;chos kyang dge 'dun no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-5: 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-6: 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-7: nang gi stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-9: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-10: chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-14: rnam pa gcig tu sgrub pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa gsum du sgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-18: mi gcig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-19: gar phyin rgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-20: rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-21: ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu rkyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-23: theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sengge sgras gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-27: 'phags pas bstan pa ltar na bdag snga nas 'tshal te sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-29: thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-36: lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-37: sems stor ba rnams skyong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:481b-38: ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:482a-1: mchis pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:482a-2: nyan thos rnams bzlog pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:482a-3: theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-4: da ltar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-6: dge slong gang zag gi nor ram /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-8: rang nyam du spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-9: yang rang smos te bdag dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-10: 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-14: dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-15: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-16: spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-18: so sor bshags pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-20: bdun shin tu lci ba'i chos rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-21: tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas pham pa la thug gi bar du nyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-22: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-24: mdo sde zab mo la skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-25: log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa nas nongs pa bcabs te 'gyod cing mthol ma myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-26: dam pa'i chos la skur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:487b-27: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488a-10: mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'or ba bgyid mi nus so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-1: sems can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-2: pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-3: rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-4: mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-5: rang gi rigs snyems te dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang nongs par ma mthong bar skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-6: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing nyon mongs pa'i sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:488b-7: 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:489a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-21: de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bo nas blangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-23: gang mang lags shing gang mi mang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-24: mang dang mi mang gnyi ga yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-25: dngos po dmigs su yod ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-26: yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-27: chos rnams kun dang mi 'gal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-28: sems can kun la byams slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-29: thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491a-30: 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-0: de bzhin @491b gshegs pa'ang de nas byon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-1: yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-3: 'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-5: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-6: de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-7: bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-8: sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-9: rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-10: le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-11: 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-12: mchod yon phul ba bzhes pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-13: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-14: dgra bcom zhes ni bgyi ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-15: rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-16: sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-17: sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-18: zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-19: 'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyen pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-20: 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-21: de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-22: mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-23: rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-24: spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-25: de slad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-26: mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-27: chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-28: dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-29: thams cad kun la byams slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-30: dus skabs sbyar zhing thabs kyis bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-32: bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-33: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:491b-34: bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-2: 'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-3: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-4: 'jig rten mkhyen zhes bgyi ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-5: thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral; ;gnyen des dge ba bstan cing btul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-6: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-7: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-8: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-9: thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-10: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-11: bla na med ces bgyi ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-12: nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-13: rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-14: de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-15: lha dang mi yi ston zhes bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-16: dus gsum g-yo 'am mi g-yo ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-17: bas sam ma bas chos kun yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-18: byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-19: de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-20: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sku nam mkha' la 'phags te zhal so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-21: kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-25: sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu'ang nga brtan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-26: rnam par grol ba'i phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-27: shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492a-28: dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi mthu'ang che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-0: de bzhin du @492b mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-1: nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-2: sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-3: 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas rgyun du nga'ang mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-4: deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-5: nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-6: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-7: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-9: de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-10: theg pa chen po mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zham ring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-12: sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-13: rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-16: mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:492b-24: mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-0: de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te sems kyis phyag 'tshal na de dag gis bsod nams dpag @493a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-1: tu med pa'ang thob par 'gyur la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-3: bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan stong gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'ang nges te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-6: de'i phyir sdig pa rnams mthol zhing bshags par byas la sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-7: gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-8: de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis gcig car du skad bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-9: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-10: bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje chen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-11: sh'akya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-12: tshogs kyi nang na sengge'i sgras //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-13: khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-14: pha la gzigs pa bcu gcig bzhin; ;rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-15: de lta bu yi bla med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-16: mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-19: khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-20: mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags pas da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-21: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493a-22: khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-0: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa @493b nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-3: dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-4: de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-6: mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byang bar gyur nas rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-7: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-9: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-11: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-13: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-14: rang sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-16: byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no; ;da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'ang phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-18: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:493b-19: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-0: byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa'ang dus gsum @494a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-1: gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-2: byang chub sems dpa' la las dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-3: byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-4: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-5: byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-6: chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang /
