K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494a-13: byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal @494b ba'i yon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-3: sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul ba'i sems 'khrugs te mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-5: gong du bstan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-6: gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-7: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-10: rab tu dga' ba bskyed la dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-14: kun chub par byas te dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la dri chus chag chag btab ste 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos zhim po bsregs nas rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsal ba mang yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-15: nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-16: gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan gcig phyi rol che chung du 'gro na khrus lan gcig byas te sengge'i khri btsugs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:494b-17: chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-0: @495a *// sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-1: dang po bas bye brag phyed cing gsol ba brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-2: de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la 'khrul sems bsal cing dran pa yang dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu mas ma mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-3: de ltar spyod pa rnams mthun zhing 'dum pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-5: de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-7: khro ba des kun 'jig par byed de spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-8: theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsam la nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-12: mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495a-13: sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-6: sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-7: sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-8: sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-9: sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-10: de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-11: de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-12: de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing mthol ba thog ma'i nyin par nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang bar dri chus yang chag chag btab ste lus la'ang spos chus bkru bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-13: pog spos bzang po bsreg cing sems thag pas mchod par byas pa de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor mthol zhing bshags pas phyogs bcur bskul bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-14: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-15: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du grub pa'i dbang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-16: de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:495b-17: ji ltar sdig 'byang bar shes she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-0: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la rtags su @496a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-1: byas te; rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-2: rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-3: des nub mo'i rmi lam na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i steng du 'gro bar rmis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-5: nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-6: gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-7: lus la char bab par rmis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-9: nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-10: gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-11: gral du 'dug par rmis na; de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-12: nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-13: gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-14: gtsug lag khang du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-17: chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-18: gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-19: de'i tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-20: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496a-25: byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-0: nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing mthol na sdig @496b mi 'byang mi srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-1: sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-5: cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe mi mang na rung ngam mi rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-7: mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-8: cho ga 'di spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-9: de ltar mthol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-12: de ltar dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-13: bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas de ni; bdag tshul khrims srung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-17: bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-19: zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-20: bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-21: rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-22: des de ltar dran pa'i tshe skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-23: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste dbang du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-24: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-25: 'phags pa 'od srung yang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do; ;'jam dpal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-27: sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-29: rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:496b-31: tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-1: ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-2: gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-6: gsum la skyabs su song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-10: 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa'am; nyams pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-11: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-12: mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshags ma mthol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-13: mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-16: ci'i slad du mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-17: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-18: dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-19: rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-24: des na 'di lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu mkhas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497a-25: legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-0: ngas bye brag @497b phyed par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-1: ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-2: skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-3: gcig tu na dgag pa'am; 'or bar bya ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-8: shin tu'ang mi bzad pa skad cig kyang mi ngal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-9: skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-10: yang rnam pa gcig tu na me chen po 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-13: rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa khong du zhugs pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-16: dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-17: gru bzhi lham pa dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de; lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing steng du'ang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g-yogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-18: 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-19: de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-20: lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-21: lcags kyi khang pa bar chad bco brgyad po brtsegs mar 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-22: rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-23: de'i gra bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi bong tshad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:497b-24: 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-3: spu gris gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-7: lcags kyi gsal shing dang mtshungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-10: spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-11: de'i dud pa mnam pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-12: 'jig rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bskrun du med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-13: dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la de'i sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srung ma bco brgyad 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-17: srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste; mgo la rva bco brgyad yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-18: lag na lcags kyi gsal shing thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-19: ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-20: rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-22: lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-24: dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na zangs po che bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar lud cing sgo bzhir bab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-25: dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-26: khang pa bar chad re re'i nang na'ang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas khar bdug pa'i me skyug cing rab kun tu gang bar gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-27: sbrul gyi sgra sgrog pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498a-28: 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-0: lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab @498b ba'ang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-1: der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-2: 'bum phrag brgyad khri'i sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i nang na mi bzad pa kun kyang der 'dus te dpe zla med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-3: mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-4: 'bar ba'ang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du yar thal mar thal zhing bla 'og dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-7: sdug bsngal gcig car ldang ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-8: gong du smos pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-12: mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin mthol tshangs ma byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-14: khrel ba med na mi de tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu stobs tshan po che'i dpung pa brkyangs shing bskums pa tsam gyis mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-15: lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste tsha ba'i gzir bas phongs nas kha gdangs mig btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:498b-16: de sdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri'i 'khor lo grangs med pa du ma zhig nam mkha' nas char bzhin 'bab ste klad par phog cing rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-0: sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin @499a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-1: brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-2: gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-3: bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-5: de las 'gyur gcig gis mang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-6: mtshams med pa lnga'ang 'gyur gcig gis mang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs pa'ang 'gyur gcig gis mang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-8: dkon mchog gsum la mi mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-9: dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-11: dge slong ma tshangs par spyad pa la dri ma can du spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-12: mkhan po dang slob dpon la dbang za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-13: ma la g-yem pa rnams gong ma dag las kyang 'gyur gcig gis bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas nam yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas mi thar pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-17: de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-18: de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srung mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te sos sos zhes bos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-19: bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-23: sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499a-24: gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-0: nam zhig @499b mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na'ang tshul khrims bshig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-1: yon bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-2: de la dmyal ba grang sbrabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-3: dmyal ba mun nag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-4: dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-5: dmyal ba spu gri'i so gtams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-6: dmyal ba ral gri'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-7: dmyal ba me'i shing rta can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-10: dmyal ba me mur klung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-11: dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-13: dmyal ba lcags kyi sha ma ri ka ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-14: dmyal ba lcags kyi khri can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-15: dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-16: dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-17: dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-18: dmyal ba bsdus 'joms thug ri can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-20: 'di rnams so sor re re'i nang du'ang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gzod thar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-21: 'on kyang rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-22: tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-23: brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-24: byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-25: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:499b-26: slar yang dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-0: nyes byas pa'i sdig pa rnams ma mthol ma bshags na dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i @500a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-1: lha'i lo grangs lta bur lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-2: de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-3: de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do; ;dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'ang de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-4: sdig can de dag gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe tshig gzhan mi phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-8: a'a ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-9: de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor mthol zhing bshags la dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su song bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-11: sdig pa myur du bsal shing 'byang bar 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-12: mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-13: cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig za gcig tu byas la yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-14: yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i tshe mi chen po'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-15: mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-17: rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-19: ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-20: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500a-21: dpa' bor 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-0: yang gcig tu na byang chub sems @500b dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yi dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-1: yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-2: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-3: shes rab sgron ma las langs te chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-4: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-5: mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te sengge'i nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-6: sengge nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te sengge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-7: sengge sprug pa las langs te rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-8: rgya mtsho yid las langs te kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-9: kun tu ye shes las langs te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-10: gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-11: kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-12: chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te sengge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:500b-13: sengge'i rgyal po las langs te chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-0: chos kyi rgyal po las langs te bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog @501a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-2: bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-3: stong pa nyid kyi shes rab las langs te stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-4: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-5: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-6: gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-7: sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdo rje'i gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-9: rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-10: rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501a-11: gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod @501b yul rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-1: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-3: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te gdod thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-4: mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-5: yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-7: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de mdo 'di yi ger 'bri ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-9: klog pa'am; kha ton du skad cig mar dran te bsam pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-11: rtogs pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-12: skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gangg'a'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-13: ma rig pa'i sgrib pa yang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-14: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:501b-16: yi dvags mthu chen thams cad dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-2: bud med g-yem dang ma rungs klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-3: dpag tu med pa'i ma rungs rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-4: ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-5: lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i phreng //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-6: las dang sems kyis sdig spyad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-7: dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-8: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-9: dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-10: thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-11: bskal pa grangs med phyir bshol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-12: ma ga dha yi skye bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-13: kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-14: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-15: gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-16: koondi n+ya la sogs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-17: nyan thos lnga brgya rnam dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-19: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-20: gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-21: mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-22: sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-23: da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-24: 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-25: rgyal ba rnams la phyag bya'i yon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-26: dam pa'i don la chud pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-27: phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-28: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-29: tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-30: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-31: gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-32: rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-33: sngon nga rgyal por byed pa'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-34: drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-35: de ni sangs rgyas ma byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502a-36: bram ze lnga brgya rnams shig la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-0: kha zas dang ni gos rnams @502b dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-1: khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-2: lo grangs nyi shu tshang bar du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-3: rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-4: des ni de tshe bsgo ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-5: khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-6: bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-7: mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-8: dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-9: mod bzhin nga la slar smras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-10: 'jig rten nang na byang chub dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-11: rnam par grol ba med do zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-12: de skad smras par ngas thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-13: mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrung ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-14: bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-15: bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-16: dmyal ba mnar med ltung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-17: sems can dmyal bar lhung nas su; ;dran pa rnam gsum g-yos nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-18: dus gsum rgyal la phyag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-19: mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-20: byang chub dge 'dun dad bskyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-21: dran pa rnam gsum byas nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-22: med la dmyal nas byung ste dong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-23: 'jig rten zil mngar rnga ru skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-24: tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-25: de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-26: phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya'i yon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-27: bram ze de dag thams cad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-28: thog ma skur bas dmyal ltung yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-29: phyis ni dad pas mod la thar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-30: byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-31: khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-32: sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-33: med pas sems can rnams kyi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-34: rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-35: mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-36: log spyod bar du mthol bshags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-37: so so'i skye bo la la zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:502b-38: de lta bu yi sdig byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-0: @503a *// de bzhin mthol tshangs byed nus na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-1: rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-2: log spyod par du sdig 'byang ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-3: sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-4: ma dad pa ni der ma gtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-5: gang zhig dad pa'i sems shes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-6: rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-7: chos lam mi 'grub mi srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-8: de nas rgyal bud dge mthong dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-9: sum stong po yi mi rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-10: bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-11: 'di skad gsol te bdag cag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-12: sangs rgyas grub na skye shi las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-13: 'khor ba'i rnam dag bsgral bar smon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-14: lha mi'i nang na btsun bzhugs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-15: bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-16: de la gzungs su bzung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-17: yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-18: de yi bsod nams ji tsam mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-20: bye brag phyed par ngas bshad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-21: rgyal bu dge mthong legs par nyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-22: gang zhig rin chen sna bdun gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-23: stong khams gang ba'i sems can la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-24: sbyin pa byas shing yon phul nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-25: de yi steng du chos bshad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-26: dgra bcom 'bras bu thob byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-27: la la zhig gis rgyal ba'i mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-28: thos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-29: skad cig dus su phyag byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-30: de yi bsod nams de bas 'da'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-31: yi ge bris shing klog 'chang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-33: de yi bsod nams dpag tu med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503a-34: gang gis yi ger bris pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-0: klog pa @503b dben [?] na 'don pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-1: dus su phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-2: mchod rten stong khams chub par du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-3: brtsigs pa'i bsod nams bas ni che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-4: de nas 'od srung chen po dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-5: sh'a ri'i bu dang kun dga' po; ;'jig rten srung ba mthu bo che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-6: tshangs lha rnams dang lha dbang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-7: 'khor los bsgyur dang rgyal chen bzhis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-8: bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-9: mtshig mthun par ni 'di skad gsol; ;bcom ldan mya ngan 'das slad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-10: bdag cag rnams kyis sems can la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-11: khyab par spel zhing bstan par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-12: lus sems rtag tu bde ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-13: phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-14: gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-15: mtshams med lnga yi sdig pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-16: mnyam pa nyid la skur ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-17: sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-18: rnam dag sa ru bde bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-19: dper na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-20: da dung ma 'ongs phyi dus la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-21: sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas tshogs chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;khyed rnams legs par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:503b-23: khyed rnams la sngon byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-0: nga sngon bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sang rgyas kyi mtshan thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te @504a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-1: thal mo sbyar cing spyi bos blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-2: blangs nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher spel zhing bstan te sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na tshogs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong nyi tshe zhig nga'i chos kyi don dang mthun te dad pa'i sems dpag tu med pa skyes nas nga'i thad du sangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas de ltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-5: rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med pa'i sdig lci pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-6: mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-7: log spyod kyi bar du sdig 'byang bar 'dod na dad pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-9: yang 'di lta ste gang la las ma dad cing ma gus pas mdo sde bcu gnyis la bskur cing dbang zos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-11: skyes bu dam pa 'jam dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-12: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams la skur cing dbang za ba rnams gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-15: de ma dad pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-16: dam pa'i chos la skur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-17: bla ma rnams la brnyas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-18: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la smad pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504a-19: nges par dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-0: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag la dad cing @504b sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-3: mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig lta zhig mi 'byang mi srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-6: dge pa'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-10: sh'akya thub pa'i sku 'bum phrag brgyar sprul pa'ang 'jig rten re re na ston pa mdzad cing bzhugs te; tha ma'i sku ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-12: de'i tshe nga dang 'grogs pa'i mi sum stong po kun da ltar sangs rgyas su grub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-13: stong dang po'i gtso bo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-15: stong par ma'i gtso bo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-16: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-17: stong tha ma'i gtso bo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-18: sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-19: de bas na khyed rnams kyang de bzhin du phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:504b-20: khyod rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshogs mang po rnams la chos ston pa rgya cher byed cing mtha' med pa'i sems can rnams la phan gdags te; khams gsum nas bzlas shing zhi ba dang dben pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor gyis la nga dang 'dra bar byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la @505a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-5: ji ltar bsgom zhing spyad par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-10: sdom pa lci ba rnams la phan gdags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-12: rdo rje rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-13: sde snod kyi sgo dpag tu med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-15: thams cad kun tu bsdus pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-17: rgya chen po dpe zla med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-19: mi sum stong sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-20: gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te bsod nams thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-22: thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-25: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-27: sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-28: bde ba chen po mdzad pa'i slad du sdig sbyangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-29: sangs rgyas su 'grub pa mdzad pa'i mdo 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505a-32: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-0: lam @505b mo; ;nyan thos rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-2: lha dang mi rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-4: de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dan dang ldan pa bdag gis gzungs su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-5: lha dang mi gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der rgya cher spel bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-6: rgyun mi 'chad cing yun du gnas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-9: khyod ni; skyes bu dam pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-10: sde snod chen po dpag tu med pa thams cad gzungs su 'dzin pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-11: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga 'gro ba'i gnas su khyod 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-12: nga 'dug pa'i gnas su khyod 'dug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa zhig phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-14: mi 'gyur pa'i sar gnas so; ;nyan thos brgyad khri zhig theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-15: dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-16: lha dang mi brgyad khri bzhi stong zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-17: sems can stong phrag brgya zhing ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bshad zin nas shing s'a la ga la ba de logs su gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:505b-20: gshegs nas gser gyi me tog rin po che rdzing bu dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyang bsdus @506a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-1: nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtho dma' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-2: gtsang sems yang sngon bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-3: mi rnams nyes byas pa'i phyir dmyal ba yang sngon bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-8: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-007:506a-9: 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas yongs su grub pa bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so //
